definitions.title: vb. fear, be afraid
definitions.body: (Aram. [[דְּחַל]], dh.el; cf. Ar. d-ah.lun rancour, malevolence; Nö:ZMG. 1886, 741)—only

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 1 S. [[זׇחַלְתִּי]] Job 32:6 therefore I feared (‖[[וׇאִירָא]]); > most, who derive fr. I. [[זׇחַל]] = shrink away in fear, hold back (RV), cf. Targum [[אִסְתְּפִּיתִי]] Fl Ch WB:ii. 571.
